EdgeError - Class in edge.helper
This class is used to report error messages to the user while also logging errors to a log file named "edge-pmt.log".

EdgeFTP - Class in edge.helper
Interface implementation of the EdgeUploader class.

Loads a fxml file and attaches a controller to the new view.

edgeLogger - Static variable in class edge.helper.EdgeError
 
EdgeLogger - Class in edge.helper
The EdgeLogger provides a neat interface to collect log data.

EdgeMailer - Class in edge.helper
EdgeMailer is used to send mails to any email address.

EdgeMailer(String) - Constructor for class edge.helper.EdgeMailer
Constructs a new instance of EdgeMailer with a single user as the receiver
EdgeSession - Class in edge.helper
This (yet) simple class is used to store a reference of the current logged in user. the interface is completely static.
EdgeSession() - Constructor for class edge.helper.EdgeSession
 
EdgeState - Enum in edge.helper
This enum represents every known state a field can have.

EdgeTemplate - Class in edge.helper

EdgeTemplateRunner - Class in edge.logic
The engine which will execute java templates Templates are build as simple Java classes which have to implement the EdgeTemplate interface.
EdgeTemplateRunner() - Constructor for class edge.logic.EdgeTemplateRunner
 
EdgeTextField - Class in edge.helper
We're sub-classing TextField & PasswordField to add custom error/success states to any of those fields.
EdgeTextField() - Constructor for class edge.helper.EdgeTextField
 
EdgeTransferListener - Class in edge.helper
Reports the upload process to the caller.
EdgeTransferListener() - Constructor for class edge.helper.EdgeTransferListener
 
EdgeUploader - Interface in edge.helper
A simple interface which will be used in the future to build flexible upload engines (FTP, SCP, Dropbox for example).
